title: Aya Terakawa
text:
(born November 12, 1984) is a retired <a href="Japanese%20people">Japanese</a> <a href="backstroke">backstroke</a> <a href="swimmer">swimmer</a>; she announced her retirement from competitions in early December 2013.
She is married to former swimmer <a href="Daisuke%20Hosokawa">Daisuke Hosokawa</a>.
